name: Utena and the Rest of the Revolutionaries Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Pink.

	Utena Tenjou is a duelist at Otori Academy, and the protector of the Rose Bride, Anthy. She strives to be like the mysterious Prince who comforted her in her childhood.

questions.text: What weapon emerges from Anthy's body?
questions.explanation:
A sword.

	Anthy is a shy and demure girl who is the Rose Bride, key to the coming revolution. As such, she is the prize in the duels between Utena and various members of the Student Council.

False.

	Akio is Anthy's brother and the acting head of Otori Academy. He used to be the same person as Dios the prince, but he later fell from grace.

questions.text: Who was Juri in love with?
questions.explanation:
Shiori.

	Juri is the captain of the school's fencing team and is very vulnerable behind her outwardly aloof manner. She carries Shiori's picture in a locket and has an orange rose.

Seventh.

	Miki was blue hair and is very polite towards Utena. He is also an excellent piano player and has a crush on Anthy because she reminds him of his estranged sister.

Red.

	Touga is the president of the Student Council, very handsome and arrogant. He cruelly manipulates others, although he claims to be pursuing noble goals.

Nanami.

	Nanami duels with a scimitar and a dagger, and is driven to duel by her desire to bring her older brother honor and also to give her a sense of self-worth. She has a romantic fixation with her big brother.

questions.text: Saionji believes that he and Anthy belong together, no matter what.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Saionji has green hair and is cruel and abusive towards Anthy, even though he does harbor some real affection for her. He is a member of the kendo team and regularly practices with Anthy.

Shiori.

	Ruka is a former member of the fencing team, and is defeated in a duel by Utena while Shiori is his Rose Bride. After the duel he dumps Shiori and begins dating Juri.

Anthy's pet marmoset.

	Although he resembles a monkey in the anime, Chu Chu is actually a marmoset. He wears one large earring and often provides comic relief in the episodes.
